metadata.title: CVE-2017-2896 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in thexls_mergedCells function of libxls 1.4. . A specially crafted XLS file cancause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attackercan send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-readxl - 1.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
